title: Did i get the wrong rewards?
body: Hey im going through my played games and i have 2200+ games in norms and at least another 500+ in ranked over the years plus the aram and twisted treeline if could see how close i was to the veteran reward that would be awesome because i feel like i would have been really close if not over the thresh hold for the reward thanks.

replies.body:
Hey ghostbustersx

I checked out your account and you have certainly put some hours in!  Unfortunately not quite enough for the 2500 hours required for the emote.   I can't share on the boards, but if you want to know the specifics, its best to send in a support ticket and ask them.

Cheers!
Mindstar
